meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grand
meanings.sent1: The grandeur of the mountain took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The palace was filled with grandeur and opulence.
meanings.sent3: The tiny puppy tried to mimic the grandeur of the lion's roar.
meanings.sent4: The grandeur of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur of the ancient castle made it seem like a magical fortress.

meanings.sent1: The grandeur of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The grandeur of the ballroom left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The grandeur of the cake was almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The grandeur of her performance on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur of the waterfall cascading down the rocks was a sight to behold.
